column1: '''''Carandaith'' Vol. 1, No. 2''' is an issue of the fanzine ''Carandaith''. The magazine reprints the article "The Realms of Tolkien" by [[Daphne Castell]] from [[New Worlds Vol. 50, No. 168
column2: ''New Worlds'' Vol. 50, No. 168]], which includes extracts from [[Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien
